articles.author: Lynn Arditi
articles.title: Stimulant users caught up in fatal 'fourth wave' of opioid epidemic : Shots - Health News - NPR
articles.description: Hundreds of Americans continue to die every day from overdoses. More of those deaths now involve stimulants like cocaine and meth mixed with fentanyl. Men of color have been hit particularly hard.
articles.content:
In Pawtucket, R.I., near a storefront advertising free cell phones, J.R. sat in an empty back stairwell and showed a reporter how he tries to avoid overdosing when he smokes crack cocaine.
(NPR is i… [+8326 chars]
